agent_output_excerpt:
## Iteration #38 Complete

**What I did:** Reviewed all roadmap implementations (v0.1 through v1.0) against actual code. Found 4 Clean Architecture violations and created `roadmap/v1.1.md` to track fixes.

**Issues found:**

| Module | Violation | Import |
|--------|-----------|--------|
| `gap_analyzer/core.py` | imports kernel + sibling module | `kernel.roadmap`, `modules.failure_analyzer` |
| `planner/core.py` | imports kernel | `kernel.roadmap.get_current_version` |
| `executor/core.py` | imports kernel | `kernel.config.ROOT` |
| `reporter/core.py` | imports kernel | `kernel.console` |

These violate the core architecture rule: **modules/ depend only on domain/**. The roadmap items were checked off, but the implementations took shortcuts by reaching into kernel/ directly instead of receiving dependencies through injection.

**New roadmap:** `roadmap/v1.1.md` â€” Architecture Compliance & Structural Integrity
- Fix all 4 module dependency violations via parameter/constructor injection
